message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I understand your position, Alice, but $15,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $13,500 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I can come down a bit further to $14,250. I think that's a very fair price for this product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but $14,250 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $13,000 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
